title: Grand Canyon Timetable
heading: To the Grand Canyon by train
top_text:
From Amtrak's Flagstaff station, served by Amtrak's Southwest Chief, you can take a short bus trip to Williams, Arizona,
from where the Grand Canyon Railway runs trains to the Grand Canyon.
Grand Canyon Railway trains can be booked through Amtrak, but booking directly gives options for additional classes of service.
There are also direct buses to the Grand Canyon from Flagstaff.

By default, buses stop at the Williams Holiday Inn, which is a few blocks away on foot from the Grand Canyon Railway Depot and Hotel.
If you are ticketed to the Williams Holiday Inn, buses will stop at the Grand Canyon Railway Depot by request. To be dropped off, ask the bus driver.
Route 66 Express shuttle vans will wait for late trains at Flagstaff.
To be picked up from the Grand Canyon Railway Depot by Groome Transportation, you must call in advance.
bottom_text: This timetable is not an offical Grand Canyon Railway, Groome Transportation, or Route 66 Express product.
